metadata.title: CVE-2019-9170 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab Community and Enterprise Edition before11.6.10, 11.7.x before 11.7.6, and 11.8.x before 11.8.1. It has IncorrectAccess Control.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
